quick read
- The deadline for the John Templeton Foundation Call for Studies (https://psysciacc.org/news/2022-04-20_special-call-for-studies-studying-generalizability-with-global-samples.html) has been extended to August 31st.

- The deadline for submitting to the 2022 Big Team Science Conference (https://bigteamscienceconference.github.io)  has been extended to August 5th.
Extended Deadline: JTF Call for Studies (https://psysciacc.org/news/2022-07-28_special-call-for-studies-studying-generalizability-with-global-samples-deadline-extended.html)

The deadline for the John Templeton Foundation Special Call for Studies (Studying Generalizability with Global Samples) has been extended to August 31st! Projects must meet call requirements and, if accepted, will be heavily supported by the PSA. Please submit your proposals here (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdY5m5rxkQ1zrt-84Q5e5wLyfuQft56HN47FqzeTvzX6l9CBA/viewform) .
https://manybabies.github.io/MB2/


2022 Big Team Science Conference (https://bigteamscienceconference.github.io/index)

The deadline for submitting to 2022 BTS-CON has been extended to August 5th. We encourage you to submit any and all work related to big team science. More information here (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIciauSbdMx7Es0Wnmp9ulOHGZtWlvaXinBm6mkLrd32WZyA/viewform) .
